p: ROP is used as correction factor when FL and RPL vlaues were different from each other and for proper rank order determination. The ROP was calculated by using formula ROP = FLxRPL, where ROP value depicts high level or order of popularity of MPs in the specific disease [ 62, 83]. These two tools (RPL and ROP) of EB study are commonly used for determination of usefulness of different MPs to cure diseases in the local area by indigenous communities.
